Frontend Developer (React/Next.js)

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Strong in React and Next.js, with proven work migrating AngularJS applications, rebuilding complex tables and forms, and collaborating closely with backend teams to improve performance and UX.

• Collaborated with backend developers to streamline data flow and integration.
